verses.verse: וַיּוֹצִאֵ֗נִי <WH3318> Then he brought me forth אֶל־ <WH413> toward הֶֽחָצֵר֙ <WH2691> court הַחִ֣יצוֹנָ֔ה <WH2435> into the utter הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> the way toward דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> toward הַצָּפ֑וֹן <WH6828> the north וַיְבִאֵ֣נִי <WH935> and he brought אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַלִּשְׁכָּ֗ה <WH3957> me into the chamber אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which נֶ֧גֶד <WH5048> opposite הַגִּזְרָ֛ה <WH1508> that [was] over against the separate place וַאֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> which נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> and opposite הַבִּנְיָ֖ן <WH1146> and which [was] before the building אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַצָּפֽוֹן׃ <WH6828> toward the north אֶל־ <WH413> toward פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> accept

אֹ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH753> the length אַמּ֣וֹת <WH520> cubits הַמֵּאָ֔ה <WH3967> of an hundred פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> door הַצָּפ֑וֹן <WH6828> [was] the north וְהָרֹ֖חַב <WH7341> and the breadth חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> [was] fifty אַמּֽוֹת׃ <WH520> cubits

נֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> Opposite הָֽעֶשְׂרִ֗ים <WH6242> Over against the twenty אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which לֶחָצֵ֣ר <WH2691> court הַפְּנִימִ֔י <WH6442> [cubits] which [were] for the inner וְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> and opposite רִֽצְפָ֔ה <WH7531> and over against the pavement אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which לֶחָצֵ֣ר <WH2691> court הַחִֽיצוֹנָ֑ה <WH2435> which [was] for the utter אַתִּ֥יק <WH862> [was] gallery אֶל־ <WH413> about פְּנֵֽי־ <WH6440> against אַתִּ֖יק <WH862> gallery בַּשְּׁלִשִֽׁים׃ <WH7992> in three

וְלִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> And before הַלְּשָׁכ֜וֹת <WH3957> the chambers מַהֲלַךְ֩ <WH4109> [was] a walk עֶ֨שֶׂר <WH6235> of ten אַמּ֥וֹת <WH520> cubits רֹ֙חַב֙ <WH7341> breadth אֶל־ <WH413> an הַפְּנִימִ֔ית <WH6442> inward דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> a way אַמָּ֣ה <WH520> cubit אֶחָ֑ת <WH259> of one וּפִתְחֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6607> and their doors לַצָּפֽוֹן׃ <WH6828> toward the north

וְהַלְּשָׁכ֥וֹת <WH3957> chambers הָעֶלְיוֹנֹ֖ת <WH5945> Now the upper קְצֻר֑וֹת <WH7114> [were] shorter כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because יוֹכְל֨וּ <WH3201> for אַתִּיקִ֜ים <WH862> for the galleries מֵהֵ֗נָה <WH2007> than these מֵֽהַתַּחְתֹּנ֛וֹת <WH8481> than the lower וּמֵהַתִּֽכֹנ֖וֹת <WH8484> and than the middlemost בִּנְיָֽן׃ <WH1146> of the building

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for מְשֻׁלָּשׁוֹת֙ <WH8027> For they [were] in three הֵ֔נָּה <WH2007> in וְאֵ֤ין <WH369> and had לָהֶן֙ עַמּוּדִ֔ים <WH5982> [stories] but had not pillars כְּעַמּוּדֵ֖י <WH5982> as the pillars הַחֲצֵר֑וֹת <WH2691> of the courts עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> after that נֶאֱצַ֗ל <WH680> therefore [the building] was straitened מֵהַתַּחְתּוֹנ֛וֹת <WH8481> more than the lowest וּמֵהַתִּֽיכֹנ֖וֹת <WH8484> and the middlemost מֵהָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> from the ground

וְגָדֵ֤ר <WH1447> And the wall אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> for לַחוּץ֙ <WH2351> that [was] without לְעֻמַּ֣ת <WH5980> over against הַלְּשָׁכ֔וֹת <WH3957> the chambers דֶּ֛רֶךְ <WH1870> toward הֶחָצֵ֥ר <WH2691> court הַחִֽצוֹנָ֖ה <WH2435> the utter אֶל־ <WH413> about פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> on the forepart הַלְּשָׁכ֑וֹת <WH3957> of the chambers אָרְכּ֖וֹ <WH753> the length חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> thereof [was] fifty אַמָּֽה׃ <WH520> cubits

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For אֹ֣רֶךְ <WH753> For the length הַלְּשָׁכ֗וֹת <WH3957> of the chambers אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which לֶחָצֵ֥ר <WH2691> court הַחִֽצוֹנָ֖ה <WH2435> that [were] in the utter חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> [was] fifty אַמָּ֑ה <WH520> cubits וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> and behold עַל־ <WH5921> and פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> and lo before הַהֵיכָ֖ל <WH1964> the temple מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> [were] an hundred אַמָּֽה׃ <WH520> cubits

[וּמִתַּחֲתָה כ] [לְּשָׁכֹות כ] (וּמִתַּ֖חַת <WH8478> Thahash ק) (הַלְּשָׁכֹ֣ות <WH3957> chamber ק) הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these [הַמָּבֹוא כ] (הַמֵּבִיא֙ <WH3996> entry ק) מֵֽהַקָּדִ֔ים <WH6921> on the east side בְּבֹא֣וֹ <WH935> as one goeth לָהֵ֔נָּה <WH2007> into them מֵֽהֶחָצֵ֖ר <WH2691> court הַחִצֹנָֽה׃ <WH2435> from the utter

בְּרֹ֣חַב ׀ <WH7341> [were] in the thickness גֶּ֣דֶר <WH1444> of the wall הֶחָצֵ֗ר <WH2691> of the court דֶּ֧רֶךְ <WH1870> toward הַקָּדִ֛ים <WH6921> the east אֶל־ <WH413> over פְּנֵ֧י <WH6440> over against הַגִּזְרָ֛ה <WH1508> the separate place וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> and over against הַבִּנְיָ֖ן <WH1146> the building לְשָׁכֽוֹת׃ <WH3957> The chambers

וְדֶ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> And the way לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> before כְּמַרְאֵ֣ה <WH4758> them [was] like the appearance הַלְּשָׁכ֗וֹת <WH3957> of the chambers אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> which [were] toward הַצָּפ֔וֹן <WH6828> the north כְּאָרְכָּ֖ן <WH753> as long as כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so רָחְבָּ֑ן <WH7341> was their width וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> and all מוֹצָ֣אֵיהֶ֔ן <WH4161> they and all their goings out וּכְמִשְׁפְּטֵיהֶ֖ן <WH4941> [were] both according to their fashions וּכְפִתְחֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH6607> and according to their doors

וּכְפִתְחֵ֣י <WH6607> And according to the doors הַלְּשָׁכ֗וֹת <WH3957> of the chambers אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> that [were] toward הַדָּר֔וֹם <WH1864> the south פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> [was] a door בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> in the head דָּ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> of the way דֶּ֗רֶךְ <WH1870> [even] the way בִּפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> before הַגְּדֶ֣רֶת <WH1448> the wall הֲגִינָ֔ה <WH1903> directly דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> toward הַקָּדִ֖ים <WH6921> the east בְּבוֹאָֽן׃ <WH935> as one entereth

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> about לִֽשְׁכ֨וֹת <WH3957> chambers הַצָּפ֜וֹן <WH6828> he unto me The north לִֽשְׁכ֣וֹת <WH3957> chambers הַדָּרוֹם֮ <WH1864> [and] the south אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אֶל־ <WH413> about פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> which [are] before הַגִּזְרָה֒ <WH1508> the separate place הֵ֣נָּה ׀ <WH2007> in לִֽשְׁכ֣וֹת <WH3957> chambers הַקֹּ֗דֶשׁ <WH6944> they [be] holy אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who יֹאכְלוּ־ <WH398> shall eat שָׁ֧ם <WH8033> There הַכֹּהֲנִ֛ים <WH3548> where the priests אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who קְרוֹבִ֥ים <WH7138> that approach לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God קָדְשֵׁ֣י <WH6944> the most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֑ים <WH6944> holy things שָׁ֞ם <WH8033> There יַנִּ֣יחוּ ׀ <WH3240> there shall they lay קָדְשֵׁ֣י <WH6944> the most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֗ים <WH6944> holy things וְהַמִּנְחָה֙ <WH4503> and the meat offering וְהַחַטָּ֣את <WH2403> and the sin offering וְהָאָשָׁ֔ם <WH817> and the trespass offering כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> for the place קָדֹֽשׁ׃ <WH6918> [is] holy

בְּבֹאָ֣ם <WH935> enter הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <WH3548> When the priests וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יֵצְא֤וּ <WH3318> therein then shall they not go out מֵהַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> of the holy אֶל־ <WH413> about הֶחָצֵ֣ר <WH2691> court הַחִיצוֹנָ֔ה <WH2435> [place] into the utter וְשָׁ֞ם <WH8033> there יַנִּ֧יחוּ <WH3240> but there they shall lay בִגְדֵיהֶ֛ם <WH899> their garments אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְשָׁרְת֥וּ <WH8334> wherein they minister בָהֶ֖ן כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> for they [are] holy הֵ֑נָּה <WH2007> in [יִלְבְּשׁוּ כ] (וְלָבְשׁוּ֙ <WH3847> apparel ק) בְּגָדִ֣ים <WH899> garments אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> on other וְקָרְב֖וּ <WH7126> and shall approach אֶל־ <WH413> about אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> to [those things] which [are] for the people

וְכִלָּ֗ה <WH3615> Now when he had made an end אֶת־ <WH853> מִדּוֹת֙ <WH4060> of measuring הַבַּ֣יִת <WH1004> house הַפְּנִימִ֔י <WH6442> the inner וְהוֹצִיאַ֙נִי֙ <WH3318> he brought me forth דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> toward הַשַּׁ֔עַר <WH8179> the gate אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> whose prospect דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> [is] toward הַקָּדִ֑ים <WH6921> the east וּמְדָד֖וֹ <WH4058> and measured סָבִ֥יב ׀ <WH5439> it round about סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> around

מָדַ֛ד <WH4058> He measured ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> side הַקָּדִ֖ים <WH6921> the east בִּקְנֵ֣ה <WH7070> reed הַמִּדָּ֑ה <WH4060> with the measuring חֲמֵשׁ־ <WH2568> five [אֵמֹות כ] (מֵאֹ֥ות <WH520> cubit ק) קָנִ֛ים <WH7070> reeds בִּקְנֵ֥ה <WH7070> reed הַמִּדָּ֖ה <WH4060> with the measuring סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

מָדַ֖ד <WH4058> He measured ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> side הַצָּפ֑וֹן <WH6828> the north חֲמֵשׁ־ <WH2568> five מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred קָנִ֛ים <WH7070> reeds בִּקְנֵ֥ה <WH7070> reed הַמִּדָּ֖ה <WH4060> with the measuring סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

אֵ֛ת <WH853> ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> side הַדָּר֖וֹם <WH1864> the south מָדָ֑ד <WH4058> He measured חֲמֵשׁ־ <WH2568> five מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred קָנִ֖ים <WH7070> reeds בִּקְנֵ֥ה <WH7070> reed הַמִּדָּֽה׃ <WH4060> with the measuring

סָבַ֖ב <WH5437> He turned about אֶל־ <WH413> about ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> side הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> to the west מָדַ֛ד <WH4058> [and] measured חֲמֵשׁ־ <WH2568> five מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred קָנִ֖ים <WH7070> reeds בִּקְנֵ֥ה <WH7070> reed הַמִּדָּֽה׃ <WH4060> with the measuring

לְאַרְבַּ֨ע <WH702> it by the four רוּח֜וֹת <WH7307> sides מְדָד֗וֹ <WH4058> He measured ח֤וֹמָה <WH2346> it had a wall לוֹ֙ סָבִ֣יב ׀ <WH5439> round about סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> around אֹ֚רֶךְ <WH753> [reeds] long חֲמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> five מֵא֔וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְרֹ֖חַב <WH7341> broad חֲמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> and five מֵא֑וֹת <WH3967> hundred לְהַבְדִּ֕יל <WH914> to make a separation בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> between the sanctuary לְחֹֽל׃ <WH2455> and the profane place
